name: Ydunian Prune
description:
The game saves automatically using browser cookies.

This game was made for Ludum Dare 50!

A story-driven clicker with a twist!

The Ydunian Tree, believed by most to be simply a myth, is so by a simple reason: it's fruit makes whoever eats it regain their youth. Regular consumption of this fruit has the ability to make someone live forever! But at what cost...

However, while strolling through the forest, you came across a sapling of this legendary tree! It is now in your hands to make the most of this.

Ydunian Prune is about gardening, the chase for immortality, the tragedy of the commons and ruthless kings.
